title: S.e.x & Love
sinopse:
Attonery Tsukihara, is in a relationship with fireman Hino. However, their continually busy lives are making it difficult to spend time with each other. Will Tsukihara's bad habits show their face...? When a junior at the office, unexpectedly comes into the picture. Spells a recipe for disaster, and Hino's senpai is inadvertently attacked.

(Source: M-U)
